description:
Apotheosismay refer to:

TheDeity of Human Origintrope, which is what the word 'Apotheosis' means.Godhood Seeker, where a character is actively seeking the above.A God Am I, where a character (rightfully or otherwise) proclaims they are or have achieved divinity.TheAbstract Apotheosistrope.The fanfic.The book series.The roleplay.

If a direct wick has led you here, please correct the link so that it points to the corresponding article.
